item.description:
Do you believe that we live after our death, that there are Angels who watch over us, near death experience, or life before birth. Do you Believe in Angels?

I have heard that angels are believed to be messengers who protect and comfort. I have felt them and experienced some of the miracles that they bring.

Angels Among Us is an inspirational, family-friendly documentary, which chronicles the experiences of real people who have felt God's presence through the appearance of heavenly messengers. From all walks of life, individuals recount the divine encounters that renewed their belief in God and restored their conviction that angels are real.

Please join us as we view this uplifting film and discuss its mystery.

Those who have lost someone to death will find a better understanding...Those who teach this subject will find this film a wonderful teaching tool..

Please call if you are joining us for the first time

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

Topics this Month:

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Angels Among Us - Movie & Discussion
